tidyList.title: Generate a random floating point number
tidyList.codebox:
import random
x = random.random()
print("Random float number is ", x)
print("Random float number is ", random.random())

tidyList.title: Generate a random hex color
tidyList.codebox:
import random
rgb = ""
for _ in "RGB":
    i = random.randrange(0, 2**8)
    rgb += i.to_bytes(1, "big").hex()
print(rgb)

tidyList.title: Generate a random integers in given range
tidyList.codebox:
import random
num = 10
start = 20
end = 40
res = []
for j in range(num):
	res.append(random.randint(start, end))
print(res)

tidyList.title: Generate a random string from given characters
tidyList.codebox:
import string
import random
chars="test"
size=4
print(''.join(random.choice(chars) for x in range(size)))
